name: Ed Sheeran
bio: English singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist known for his melodic pop songs.

name: The Weeknd
bio: Canadian singer, songwriter and record producer with a distinctive voice and dark pop sound.

name: Dua Lipa
bio: British-Albanian pop singer known for her disco-inspired hits and confident style.

name: Adele
bio: British singer-songwriter noted for her soulful voice and emotionally powerful ballads.

name: Harry Styles
bio: English singer, songwriter and actor known for his modern rock and pop sound.

name: The Kid LAROI & Justin Bieber
bio: Australian rapper-singer The Kid LAROI teams up with global pop icon Justin Bieber for chart-topping collaborations.

name: Billie Eilish
bio: American singer-songwriter known for her haunting vocals and minimalist production style.

name: Justin Bieber
bio: Canadian pop singer recognized for his versatile sound and massive global success.

name: Miley Cyrus
bio: American singer, songwriter, and actress known for her distinctive raspy voice and genre-blending music.

name: Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars
bio: British producer Mark Ronson and American singer Bruno Mars collaborated for timeless funk-pop hits.
